name: Band Maker Party Dungeon
description:
Use random musicians and band names to form the ultimate band, and hear your creations as they play together! Make the people dance!

Music: Mat Solomon, Joe Marchuk

Artwork: Brian Soulliard, Brian Dorfman, Dan Williams

Development: Tom Caron, Corey Fraser, Dan Williams, Brian Soulliard

Honorable Mention: Tom Howard
